comment: Jesus is a Jew & judges your life, were you an antisemite hater or did you live a life according to God's laws?

                  :domain (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Jesus")))
            :op2 (j / judge-01
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (l / life
                        :poss (y / you))))
      :snt2 (a2 / amr-choice
            :op1 (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / hate-01
                        :ARG1 (o / oppose-01
                              :ARG1 r
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Jew"))))
            :domain (y2 / you))
      :op2 (l2 / live-01
            :ARG0 y2
            :ARG1 (l3 / life
                  :ARG1-of (c / conform-01
                        :ARG2 (l4 / law
                              :poss (p4 / person
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "God")))))))

amr:

      :snt1 (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (s / save-02

                  :location (o / outside
                        :op1 (b / book
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Gospel"
                                    :op2 "of"
                                    :op3 "Christ"))))
            :ARG1 (m2 / make-02
                  :ARG0 (s2 / shill-01

                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "Islam"))
                                    :op2 (r3 / religious-group

                        :domain (y / you))))
      :snt2 (g / get-03

            :ARG2 (l / lost-02
